titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on the March 31, 2019, presidential election in Ukraine.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on the March 31, 2019, presidential election in Ukraine.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for a transparent presidential election in Ukraine on March 31, 2019. The resolution directs the U.S. President to (1) assess the scope of Russian interference in Ukraine's election, and (2) asses the future of U.S.-Ukraine relations under Ukraine's new president.
